title: Add drop indicator line to task drag-and-drop reordering

requirements.text: Add a visual drop indicator line to task drag-and-drop reordering in all task containers (Eisenhower Matrix quadrants and Custom Lists), matching the same drop indicator line behavior that already exists for routine item reordering in MorningRoutine.tsx.

quotes: in version 193 only routine appears indicator line, tasks dont have it

acceptanceCriteria: When dragging a task over a valid drop target within a task list, a visible indicator line appears between task items showing the insertion position.
The indicator line updates dynamically as the user drags over different positions in the list.
The indicator line disappears when the drag ends (drop or cancel).
The drop indicator line visual style matches the existing drop indicator line used in MorningRoutine.tsx for routine items.
The indicator line works in all task container contexts: Eisenhower Matrix quadrants and Custom Lists.
Existing task drag-and-drop reorder functionality continues to work correctly after the change.

constraints: Do not modify the routine drag-and-drop indicator logic in MorningRoutine.tsx â€” only replicate/mirror its pattern for tasks.
Do not alter backend logic or data persistence for task reordering.
nonGoals: Changing the visual style of the routine drop indicator.
Adding drop indicators for cross-container task drag operations.
